name: Diana
description: '''	Ana Maria Siqueira Iorio''' (2 June 1948 â€“ 21 August 2024), known by the [[stage name]] '''Diana''', was a Brazilian singer who gained fame in the 1970s. She was born Ana Maria Siqueira Iorio, in [[Botafogo]] neighbourhood, in [[Rio de Janeiro]] city, at 2 June, and raised in the [[Leblon]] neighbourhood. Her fans gave her the nickname "The Love Singer of Brazil". Her song styles are Jovem Guarda and Brazilian Pop.
